summary: The bill, titled the Radiation Oncology Case Rate Value Based Program Act of 2025, proposes amending the Social Security Act to establish a value-based payment program for radiation oncology services. This program, the ROCR Program, aims to create stable payments, reduce disparities, enhance quality of care, leverage technology, and contain costs. It outlines payment structures, including per-episode payments, adjustments, and quality incentives. The bill also addresses patient transportation assistance and exempts the program from budget neutrality adjustments. Furthermore, it modifies civil monetary penalties regarding patient transportation and excludes participating providers from the Merit-Based Incentive Payment System.
